issue.title: za.ign.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://za.ign.com/joker-folie-a-deux/173109/news/joker-sequel-first-look-at-lady-gaga-in-character-revealed](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fza.ign.com%2Fjoker-folie-a-deux%2F173109%2Fnews%2Fjoker-sequel-first-look-at-lady-gaga-in-character-revealed) ### Comment > Could be an iPhone specific issue. Or it may not be working as effectively as it could on the subdomain. can you check on the iPhone? I can't reproduce it on my computer either, only on my iPhone. Of course, I have updated filters. ### Screenshots
